function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Urban poverty as a driver of epidemics such as Zika","Impact":"Increased risk of epidemics and contagious diseases","Mitigation":"Addressing underlying urban poverty and improving living conditions","Technologies":"Urban planning, basic infrastructure, and housing design","People":"Urban residents","Owner":"Urban planners and policymakers"},{"Description":"Lack of indicators and targets for promoting sustainable urban development","Impact":"Difficulty in measuring the importance of health in urban development policies","Mitigation":"Developing indicators and targets that emphasize health as a precondition and outcome of policies","Technologies":"Data collection and analysis tools","People":"Policy analysts, urban planners, and public health officials","Owner":"Policy analysts and urban planners"},{"Description":"Inadequate infrastructure for controlling vector-borne disease risks","Impact":"Increased vulnerability to vector-borne diseases in urban areas","Mitigation":"Improving basic infrastructure for disease control and prevention","Technologies":"Vector control technologies, sanitation systems, and waste management","People":"Urban residents and public health officials","Owner":"Public health agencies and local government"}]}
